statements: SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, assigned_to FROM tasks ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE status='In Progress';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'completed' ORDER BY deadline DESC
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM tasks WHERE status = 'in progress' AND assigned_to = 'Alice'
SELECT task_id, task_name, deadline FROM tasks WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY deadline ASC
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'pending' AND deadline > '2022-01-01'
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to, deadline FROM tasks WHERE deadline BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-01' ORDER BY task_id
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE status='To Do';
SELECT task_name, assignee_id FROM tasks ORDER BY assignee_id DESC;
SELECT task_name, assignee_id, status FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id=1;
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY member_name;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE status = 'To Do';
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 1;
SELECT task_id, task_name FROM tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, status FROM tasks ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM Tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TeamMembers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM Projects ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tasks JOIN Projects ON Tasks.task_id = Projects.project_id WHERE Tasks.status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, deadline FROM Projects WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT member_name, role, location FROM TeamMembers WHERE role = 'Manager' LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to, status FROM Tasks WHERE status = 'Pending' AND assigned_to = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM project_tasks;
SELECT task_description, assigned_to FROM project_tasks ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_id, status, notes FROM task_tracking WHERE status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY tracking_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT task_id, task_description, due_date FROM project_tasks WHERE completed = TRUE
SELECT member_name, email, role FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer'
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT task_description, assigned_to, due_date FROM project_tasks WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT task_id, comment FROM task_comments ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_status FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 1 AND task_status = 'Completed';
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM team_members WHERE member_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT team_name FROM project_teams WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3);
